title: Universidad Europea, UE.
subtitle: Master of Science, Aeronautical Engineering
description: Thesis: Computer Vision for Automated Quality Control: Defect Detection in Metallurgical Processes using Deep Learning. Explored and evaluated multiple computer vision models, testing alternative solutions for the same classification problem. Conducted comparative analysis to identify the most effective architectures, with some models achieving 100% accuracy on the provided datasets.
